üìö Currently, I am pursuing a PhD in Autonomous Driving at RobeSafe Research Group (Universidad de Alcal√°). My research is centered around developing Deep Learning-based techniques for enhancing Perception based on Automotive RADAR and Camera Fusion.
üó£Ô∏è I am always enthusiastic about collaborations and eager to engage in technical discussions, so feel free to reach out to me!
